bibl.title: The Database AGRE - Agriculture in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: An online database of Ptolemaic and Roman Demotic agricultural texts (Univ. of Tübingen, first phase, end of 2008).

bibl.title: Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007

bibl.seg: WINKLER Andreas, The Database AGRE - Agriculture in Graeco-Roman Egypt.

Sandra LIPPERT and Maren SCHENTULEIT (Edd.), Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007 (Wiesbaden, 2008) pp. 223-224.
An online database of Ptolemaic and Roman Demotic agricultural texts (Univ. of Tübingen, first phase, end of 2008).
